00029 enum ioctl_cmd {noop, primarycfg, secondarycfg, primaryhostcfg, secondaryhostcfg, newsession};

00031 typedef struct _p3primarycfg p3primarycfg;
00032 typedef struct _p3secondarycfg p3secondarycfg;

00046 struct _p3primarycfg {
00047     union {
00048         struct in_addr  v4;
00049         struct in6_addr v6;
00050     } addr;                         /*<< Host address that communicates with secondaries */
00051     int             port;           /*<< Primary listener port */
00052     int             array_size;     
00053     int             rk_wait;        
00054     int             datidx_wait;    
00055     int             ctlidx_wait;    
00056     int             hb_wait;        
00057     int             hb_fail;        
00058     unsigned int    flag;
00059     // reserve p3HST_IPV4   0x00100000  Host address is IPv4
00060     // reserve p3HST_IPV6   0x00200000  Host address is IPv6
00061 };
00062 
00071 struct _p3secondarycfg {
00072     union {
00073         struct in_addr  v4;
00074         struct in6_addr v6;
00075     } addr;                     /*<< Host address that communicates with primaries */
00076     unsigned int    flag;
00077     // reserve p3HST_IPV4   0x00100000  Host address is IPv4
00078     // reserve p3HST_IPV6   0x00200000  Host address is IPv6
00079 };
00080 
00089 struct _p3prihostcfg {
00090     union {
00091         struct in_addr  v4;
00092         struct in6_addr v6;
00093     } addr;                     /*<< Host address (IPv4 or IPv6) */
00094     p3subnetcfg     *subnets;   /*<< List of subnets */
00095     int             subnetsz;   /*<< Number of subnet structures following */
00096     int             port;       /*<< Primary listener port */
00097     unsigned int    flag;
00098 // reserve p3HST_ID     0x000fffff  Host ID
00099 // reserve p3HST_IPV4   0x00100000  Host address is IPv4
00100 // reserve p3HST_IPV6   0x00200000  Host address is IPv6
00101 };
00102 
00111 struct _p3sechostcfg {
00112     union {
00113         struct in_addr  v4;
00114         struct in6_addr v6;
00115     } addr;                     /*<< Host address (IPv4 or IPv6) */
00116     p3subnetcfg     *subnets;   /*<< List of subnets */
00117     int             subnetsz;   /*<< Number of subnet structures following */
00118     int             rk_wait;    /*<< Rekey period in seconds */
00119     int             hb_wait;    /*<< Period between heartbeats in seconds */
00120     int             hb_fail;    /*<< Length of heartbeat failure in seconds */
00121     int             ditime;     /*<< Period to rekey data from list */
00122     int             citime;     /*<< Period to rekey control from list */
00123     unsigned int    flag;
00124 // reserve p3HST_ID     0x000fffff  Host ID
00125 // reserve p3HST_IPV4   0x00100000  Host address is IPv4
00126 // reserve p3HST_IPV6   0x00200000  Host address is IPv6
00127 // reserve p3HST_ARRAY  0x00400000  Key arrays allowed
00128 // reserve p3HST_KTYPE  0x0f000000  Key type field
00129 // reserve p3HST_KTSHF  24          Field shift amount
00130 };
00131 
00140 struct _p3subnetcfg {
00141     p3subnetcfg         *next;  /*<< List pointer */
00142     union {
00143         struct in_addr  v4;
00144         struct in6_addr v6;
00145     } net;                      /*<< Network address (IPv4 or IPv6) */
00146     struct in_addr      mask;   /*<< Network mask (IPv4) */
00147     int                 id;     /*<< Subnet ID under remote host */
00148 };
00149 
00158 struct _p3newsession {
00159     union {
00160         struct in_addr  v4;
00161         struct in6_addr v6;
00162     } addr;                         /*<< Network address (IPv4 or IPv6) */
00163     int                 flag;
00164 // reserve p3IP_TYPE    0x30000000  /* IP version field */
00165     char                datakey[p3MAX_KSIZE];   
00166     char                ctlkey[p3MAX_KSIZE];    
00167 };
